o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Check_ScalarBusinessRule_HasAtLeastOneOutputAttribute
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that every scalar business rule has at least one output attribute
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following scalar business rules have no attribute(s) with the output stereotype:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript:
Function %Check%(obj) Dim boolResult, objAttribute boolResult = False For Each objAttribute In obj.Attributes If objAttribute.HasStereotype("mdde_OutputAttribute") Then boolResult = True Exit For End If Next
%Check% = boolResult End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
